diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: Test the end-to-end connectivity between CIDgravity and your miner

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Access guides on installing and using CIDgravity

community.title: Community
community.description:
Join our community to ask questions, get help, or discuss all things with fellow storage providers, developers and experts.

You will also have DM access to the CIDgravity team.

training.title: Training
training.bookCallWithExpert:
Struggling to use CIDgravity or to get the most of it? Book a 30 minutes one-on-one with our expert.

He will answer all your questions, assist you troubleshooting or simply run a complete demo of the product.
training.formDefaultMessage: Hi, I book this time to know more on how to use CIDgravity, talk to you soon.
